channel.title: No Clipping
channel.description: Okay, I've been working on a delta style server, and I've run into a bug where when you follow someone you can and will no-clip through anything that gets in your way. Water/Trees/Buildings etc. I have NO clue how to fix this so I can't provide any proof that I tried to fix this myself. I was hoping someone here could tell me what's wrong...

item.title: No Clipping
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Rip it from Dynasty.

Read full topic

It is like that in every 317. There hasn’t been a released way to fix it.
[/quote]Yes there has, there is tutorials how to on Rune-serv…[/quote]

O.o thanks for that ^^
